mods.abstract: A RUNAWAY IN JAIL. WAS committed into the Jail of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 13th of June instant, a runaway negro-man calling himself JOE BROWN, and says that he belongs to widow Ramsey or Dr. Lee, residing on Bayou BÅ“uf, in the Parish of St. Landry. Joe Brown, is 5 feet, 9 inches high, about 25 years old, speaking but english. The owner of said slave is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. CHS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, June 18th, 1853.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
